title: gccgo: one more crash
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

gccgo -o k *.go

What is the expected output?

gccgo: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault (program go1)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

gccgo

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

gofrontend revision d6220b7c3a56

Please provide any additional information below.

I've attached the script I use to run these tests in case anyone is interested.
Attachments: 1. fuzzgc.py (1958 bytes)
